english.segment1: On a hill. There was a cross. And all was lost. In need of a Savior
english.segment2: There You were. Arms stretched wide, crucified. No love could be greater. Than when You laid down Your life
english.segment3: Who am I that You would come and die?. I don't understand. Why the God of all the universe. Would become a man
english.segment4: To redeem the mess that I have made. Take away the shame. Of what I've done. There is no, no greater love
english.segment5: Every sin. That held me down. Is lifted now. Because of Your mercy
english.segment6: Here I stand, forgiven and free. Grace covers me. Though I'm so unworthy. But You laid down Your life
english.segment7: Who am I that You would come and die?. I don't understand. Why the God of all the universe. Would become a man
english.segment8: To redeem the mess that I have made. Take away the shame. Of what I've done. There is no, no greater love
english.segment9: What love that You would give. Your life that I might live
english.segment10: Who am I that You would come and die?. I don't understand. Why the God of all the universe. Would become a man
english.segment11: To redeem the mess that I have made. Take away the shame. Of what I've done. There is no, no greater love
